name: Father Time's Fun House
description:
You somehow ended up in Father Time's Fun House. A endless place outside the bounds of time. Have fun exploring!

This game is a collab between GameMaster1(me) and Ben Tibbets. Ben came up with the idea of the game and made the music. I just made a game to go with it.

Controls:

All you do is walk with the arrow keys. You can hold shift to run.

Music:

The wonderful talent of Ben Tibbets

Art Assets:

Some of it is reused from my (GameMaster1's)  previous game jam games. 

Main character sprite from Enflared

All the remaining assets are placeholders such as walls, floors, clocks, ect. are edited sprites from Yoobii's games. I will replace these assets in a future update.
